metadata.title: Page Builder | Visual Page Editor
metadata.description: Create professional web pages without coding knowledge. Easy page editing with drag and drop.

footer.description: Create professional web pages without coding knowledge.

hero.title: Building Excellence Since 1993
hero.subtitle: Our Story
hero.description: Discover how Vav Yapƒ± has become one of Turkey's leading construction companies through dedication, innovation, and an unwavering commitment to quality.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From Humble Beginnings
story.paragraph1: Founded in 1993 with a vision to transform the Turkish construction landscape, Vav Yapƒ± started as a small family business with just a handful of dedicated craftsmen.
story.paragraph2: Over three decades, we have grown into one of the most trusted names in construction, delivering over 500 successful projects ranging from luxury residences to large-scale industrial complexes.
story.paragraph3: Our success is built on a simple philosophy: never compromise on quality, always deliver on time, and treat every project as if it were our own.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: What We Stand For
values.description: These principles guide every decision we make and every project we undertake.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We apply the highest quality standards in every project, using premium materials and proven techniques.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We build transparent and trust-based relationships with our clients, partners, and community.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace the latest technologies and methods to deliver better results efficiently.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We listen, adapt, and exceed expectations.

founding.title: Company Founded
founding.description: Vav Yapƒ± was established in Istanbul with a vision to deliver quality construction.

expansion.title: Regional Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded operations to multiple cities across Turkey, completing our 100th project.

international.title: International Projects
international.description: Began accepting international projects, entering markets in Europe and the Middle East.

modernization.title: Digital Transformation
modernization.description: Invested in cutting-edge technology and BIM systems for enhanced project management.

today.title: Industry Leader
today.description: Recognized as one of Turkey's top construction companies with 500+ completed projects.

team.title: Meet Our Leadership
team.subtitle: Our Team
team.description: Our experienced management team brings decades of combined expertise to every project.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional construction solutions that exceed expectations, create lasting value for our clients, and contribute positively to the communities we serve.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted and innovative construction company in the region, setting new standards for quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protecting your personal data is important to us
privacy.intro: At Vav Yapƒ±, we value the privacy of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how information collected when you use our website is processed.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: When you visit our website, we collect information you provide through contact forms (name, email, phone number, message content). Additionally, technical information sent by your browser (IP address, browser type, visited pages) is automatically recorded.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
The data we collect is used for the following purposes:
‚Ä¢ Responding to your requests
‚Ä¢ Improving our services
‚Ä¢ Communicating with you
‚Ä¢ Fulfilling our legal obligations

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data. Your data is transmitted over encrypted connections and stored on secure servers.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to request access, correction, deletion, and restriction of processing of your personal data. You can contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. Cookies are used to remember your preferences and analyze site traffic. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our privacy policy, you can reach us at info@vavyapi.com or through our contact form.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read before using our website
terms.intro: These terms of service govern your use of the Vav Yapƒ± website. By using our site, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our site.

services.title: Services
services.content: Vav Yapƒ± provides construction and contracting services. Our website is designed to provide information about our services and communicate with potential clients.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content:
Users are obligated to:
‚Ä¢ Provide accurate and up-to-date information
‚Ä¢ Use the site in compliance with laws
‚Ä¢ Respect the rights of others
‚Ä¢ Not share harmful content

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website (text, images, logos, designs) belongs to Vav Yapƒ± and is protected by copyright. Unauthorized use, copying, or distribution of content is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Vav Yapƒ± does not guarantee that the website will operate without interruption or error. While maximum care is taken for the accuracy of information on the site, no responsibility is accepted for possible errors.

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.content: Turkish law shall apply to disputes arising from these terms, and Istanbul Courts and Enforcement Offices shall have jurisdiction.
